Title: The Dread Clutches
Description:
The imperial clutches have become an abomination! Clutch-Keepers rush the development of new swarmborn, saturating them in this vile "sha" energy before sending them away to the wall.

The Klaxxi wish to stem the tide of swarmborn production in these dread clutches. Put the keepers to death!
ObjectivesText: Slay 6 Shek'zeer Clutch-Keepers in the Clutches of Shek'zeer.
CompletionText: They have forsaken our ways and they will pay dearly for it.
RewardText: A few less traitors for us to feed to the kunchong when the dust settles.
